document_data.caption: ''The crypt's location on the [[Polyandrium]].''
document_data.name: Ikeshia's Crypt
document_data.mainbody: '''Ikeshia's Crypt''' was one of many crypts located in [[Polyandrium]] of [[Myth Drannor]]. The final resting place of [[Ikeshia]], an [[elf|elven]] noblewoman and philanthropist.
document_data.Location: Ikeshia's Crypt was nestled between the [[Crypt of Kesefehon]] to the north and [[Lyssic's Crypt]] to south-west.
document_data.Structure: This crypt was one the smaller size but was masterfully built, encrusted in [[marble]], its walls lined with intricate frescos.
document_data.Interior: Ikeshia's Crypt was a small chamber. The room held several sarcofagi of Ikeshia's family. One of which had a hidden panel in its floor that held withered manuscripts, old [[inkwell]]s, [[sealing wax]], and single [[gold]]en seal with the elven noble family crest.
document_data.History: Before [[Myth Drannor]]'s destruction in the [[Weeping War]], this crypt was sealed with elven ''word of power'' "haladrin" and the ''rune of cats''. In [[1369 DR]], the [[Cult of the Dragon]] occupied the ruins of the City of Song and Ikeshia's Crypt was one of the tombs unsealed and ransacked by them.
